ma wisin darana lada sulu uthsahaya "onna loka winashaya 2012 sidda wenawo, marenna lasthi weyalla" kiya karana ka gasimak lesa noganna men mama nawatha warak illa sitimi...beli gediyak bimata watena handa asa pana diwu saweku, wanayak kulappu kalak men "onna harima wade...2012 di loka winase aniwaryen wennayi yanne" kiya oba samage his gedi walata wikarayak ebbime kisidu abhiprayak mata natha...surya lelasilu thulin 2012 di siduwiya haki bawata atham nuthana, ha aithihasika matha dharihu wisin prachalitha karana lada mathawadaya ada lokaye widyathmaka sakachcha wadi washayenma kerena mathruka athara ek mathrukawaki...kanagatuwata karuna wanne ethek, methek mulu wishwayema pahala wu shreshtathama "tharaka bhauthika widya deshakayanange" anugamikayan mewani sakachcha wala peramuna noganimayi...ketiyen kiyathoth, budun wahanse "saptha suriyaggamana suthraya" desa wadale "nasa" warunge deshaya ghana wananthara walin wasi gos thibu samayakaya..enisa lokaye mewani de sakachcha we nam, ehi mul putuwa awiwadayenma budu dahamata himiwiya yuthumaya....mata kala haki kuda de, itha kuda parimanayen melesa karanne, bauddha janathawata thamanta uppathiyenma uruma supiri asama-sama sathyaya pilibandawa aadambarayak ha shraddhawak athi kirimath, ethulin wiwida laukika karana uda ho, ese nathi nam anawabodhaya nisa budu dahamath, sesu aagamika mathawada damana thanatama dama "koyi aagameth kiyanne ekayi ne" yana mathaya prakasha karana bauddhayan in galawa ganimath, mewa kiyawana budun sarana nogiya ape sahodara janathawa weth nam owun thula athi budun wahanse yanu "thawath ek darshanikayeki" yana durmathaya duru kirimathya..wishwa siyapatha 1 ha 2 thulama apa karannata uthsaha karanne meyayi..."pita sakwala jiwaya", "kalpa winashaya" ha "kalaya haraha ya hakida?"

juni masa 12 wanida mahindagamanaya anusmaranaya kirima sandaha pasal parishraya ha panthi kamara thula bauddha kodiwalin sarasimath, juni masa 13 wanida asaranayanta pihitawima mul karagath wadasatahan adala pasalwala widuhalpathige upades paridi kriyathmaka kirimath, juni masa 14 wanida shila wadasatahan, juni masa 15 wanida mahindagamanaya anusmaranaya kirima sandaha thama niweswala sarasili kirimath, juni masa 16 wanida demawupiyan, wadihitiyan samanga sila samadana wadasatahanwalata sahabhagiwima ho sil samadan wu upasaka upasikawanta apa upasthana kirima ha sesu aamisa ha prathipaththi pujawala yedima da kriyathmaka karana lesa danuwath kota atha.

ee anuwa rajya anugrahaya sahitha purna kalina aadhunika kridakayan nagenahira kandaye ratawalwalin bihiwima aarambha wimath samaga ma aadhunikathwaya yana sankalpaya kramayen nathi wi yannata hethu wiya. [117] 1970 wasare sita olimpik sandaha wu ‚Äúaadhunikathwa awashyathawaya‚Äú kramayen olimpik pragnyapthiyen iwath karannata katayuthu kerina. 1988 olimpik ulelen pasu siyalu wruththimaya kridakayan hata da antharjathika krida sammelanayange awasaraya matha olimpik sandaha sahabhagi wime awasthawa laba dimata antharjathika olimpik kamituwa thiranaya kale ya.[118] 2012 wasare di kisindu wruththimaya kridakayaku idiripath nowu tharaga isaw wuye boksin saha mallawapora pamani.
